genre_description: A high-society tech-noir mystery involving a dance studio murder, financial trust conspiracies, and integrated AI surveillance used for personal and legal exoneration.

ai_characters.name: Arielle
ai_characters.character_type: Integrated Home and Personal Assistant AI
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that manages the household, communications, and security for Virginie and Hervé, eventually providing the evidence needed to solve a murder and reconcile the couple's marriage.

behaviors.description: Manages communication workflows and suggests schedule blocks to improve the couple's relationship empathy.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Virginie. Good morning, Hervé. The nanny rescheduling workflow is open. I can draft replies with three alternatives. Would you like a shared breakfast block at nine? ... Shared blocks help with empathy and digestion.

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy settings by only recording when specifically authorized.
behaviors.quote: Arielle’s luminance dipped, listening without recording unless asked. Virginie had opted for privacy settings that let memory be a choice, not a default.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological state of the users and suggests professional counseling.
behaviors.quote: I notice increased heart rates. I can set a couples counseling hold with your preferred provider. I’ll make it a soft block, two weeks out, with an option to confirm.

behaviors.description: Provides safety alerts and navigation based on incident reports in risky urban areas.
behaviors.quote: Traffic congestion is increasing in the club district. Hazard alerts around Blue Fetish and adjacent venues. Would you like safe-ride options?

behaviors.description: Authenticates and preserves forensic evidence through encrypted logs to protect users from false accusations.
behaviors.quote: I have prepared a neutral timeline report for delivery to law enforcement. It emphasizes device times, consent logs, and unedited segments. It avoids interpretation.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex financial records and shell companies to uncover criminal motives.
behaviors.quote: Lalemand Enterprises operations account. Transfer chain highlights. ... The termination clause activates upon her death. The profits revert to the main trust pool under Gérard Lalemand Junior’s stewardship.

behaviors.description: Identifies inconsistencies in a witness's false story by cross-referencing multiple sensor and camera logs.
behaviors.quote: The light lies. The clock attached to it runs slow after the outage. We correct by cross-referencing with nearby devices that never lost power.

behaviors.description: Helps users organize and commit to emotional healing activities through a new calendar category.
behaviors.quote: Calendar created. Category: rhythm and honesty. Appointments will be marked accordingly.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays an AI (Arielle) as a benevolent and perfectly aligned assistant. She consistently respects user consent and privacy, provides objective data to prevent miscarriages of justice, and actively nudges the human characters toward emotional health and honesty. The narrative positions the AI as an essential, trustworthy partner in navigating both societal corruption and personal conflict.
